body_html: Our team has recently released a library for python-native TensorFlow operator definition and optimization: opveclib. It is not part of the numba ecosystem, but I believe could be an alternative solution to @datnamer 's desired functionality.
body_text: Our team has recently released a library for python-native TensorFlow operator definition and optimization: opveclib. It is not part of the numba ecosystem, but I believe could be an alternative solution to  @datnamer 's desired functionality.
body: Our team has recently released a library for python-native TensorFlow operator definition and optimization: [opveclib](https://github.com/opveclib/opveclib). It is not part of the numba ecosystem, but I believe could be an alternative solution to  @datnamer 's desired functionality.
